patthana15.12:1.1: Nahetuṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
patthana15.12:2.1: Hetuṃ mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.12:3.1: Hetuṃ appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
